EmailTemplate.description: Letter indicating anticipated attendance at a seminar.
EmailTemplate.name: Anticipated Attendance
EmailTemplate.subject: We are excited to see you at the ClearChoice Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are excited to see you at the Seminar!
{!CampaignMember.FirstName} {!CampaignMember.LastName} {!CampaignMember.Street} {!CampaignMember.City}, {!CampaignMember.State} {!CampaignMember.PostalCode}
Hello {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
We have reserved a seat for you at the ClearChoice patient seminar on {!CampaignMember.Campaign_Date_Time__c} at the {!CampaignMember.Campaign_Location_Name__c}.
You can look forward to:
Learning how implants can provide a clear solution to your dental needs Answers to questions that address your dental condition Hear a past patient’s experience with ClearChoice Meeting the doctors and patients Refreshments!!
We provide a clear advantage through our unique All in One Center. We have enclosed a map to the {!CampaignMember.Campaign_Location_Name__c}. Please feel free to call {!CampaignMember.Campaign_Center_Phone_Number__c} if you need further directions.
Sincerely, {!CampaignMember.Campaign_Center_Address__c}
